content: Stream created by Morgan Rogers.
Christian Williams renamed stream topos theory to theory: topos theory.
Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.

Matteo Capucci (he/him) changed the description for this stream.

  • Old description:

A stream to discuss toposes, Grothendieck or elementary, 1- to oo-

  • New description:

Deprecated, use #theory: mathematics instead. A stream to discuss toposes, Grothendieck or elementary, 1- to oo-
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream theory: topos theory to deprecated: topos theory.
